summary: A timeless Carpathian story - the young Ivan falls in love with the daughter of his father's killer among the Hutsul people of Ukraine.
cast: Ivan Mikolaychuk|Larisa Kadochnikova|Tatyana Bestayeva|Spartak Bagashvili|Nikolay Grinko|Leonid Yengibarov|Nina Alisova|Aleksandr Gai|Neonila Gnepovskaya|Aleksandr Raydanov|Igor Dzyura|Valentina Glinko
title: Los corceles de fuego
